__docs__.overview: Unified system DSL formal JSON scenario UI/runtime layer. DSL core fixed, runtime reads and enforces. VORTEXHUB UNIVERSAL ADAPTER V9 ALL VERSIONS v5-v9 MERGED ZERO DELETION 100% PRESERVATION ALL CHAT HISTORY + FILE-1.TXT + ALL PREVIOUS INSTRUCTIONS + VORTEX_REPOS + CORE_FILES + BUILD_PATHS MULTIPLE MODELS NO CONFLICT FULL FUSION 135 ADAPTERS 50 HARDWARE 60 PORTS 15+ RUNTIMES TOKEN SYSTEM COMPLETE.
design_principles: Runtime executes DSL, not replaces it
JSON central brain, DSL formal core, worker muscle WASM sandbox, HTML skin UI swappable
Zero deletion policy across ALL versions v5-v9, ALL manifests, ports, runtimes, adapters, hardware, token system, UI schema, INPUT/OUTPUT specs, REPOS/FILES
Parallel sandbox isolation: هر sandbox مستقل + موازی + انتزاعی + user input validation + structured output + download capability
ALL chat instructions + file-1.txt + vortex_repos + core_files + build_paths FULLY PRESERVED NO CONFLICT

dsl_core.__formal_model: S = ⟨ FS, AD, SA, RT, CP, KB, HW, IDX, TS, UI, ARCHIVE, BOOT, VORTEX, PORTS, WORKER, IO ⟩
dsl_core.FS: filesystem scan: root, recursive, depth, targets, exclude
dsl_core.AD: adapter discovery: sources, detection methods, auto classification
dsl_core.SA: source analysis: static, semantic, control flow, dependency graph, auto language detection
dsl_core.RT: runtime: detect mode, sandboxed execution, strict isolation, binding semantic + capability mirror, token check, edge native, limits, PARALLEL_SANDBOX
dsl_core.CP: capability layer: generation, default DENY, dynamic resolution, token based, hardcoded disabled
dsl_core.KB: kernel bridge: abstract syscall, process, memory, descriptor, interrupt models
dsl_core.HW: hardware support and access mediation via adapters only, kernel controlled
dsl_core.IDX: auto index: registers, syscalls, memory pages, devices, modules
dsl_core.TS: token system: daily free, plans, modules, autosync, autolog
dsl_core.UI: UI schema: tabs, components, dynamic render, language switch, auto generate
dsl_core.ARCHIVE: archive engine: format detection, extraction pipeline, plugin registry, normalizer
dsl_core.BOOT: bootstrap and entry manifest: XECO universal adapter / runtime OS single entry, locked IR contract, zero deletion
dsl_core.VORTEX: VortexHub config: SSH dual main, R2, repos, engines, adapters, workers
dsl_core.PORTS: ports: master ports, query ports, runtime ports, hardware ports, capability mapped
dsl_core.WORKER: worker: VortexHub worker V9, JS/WASM sandbox, dynamic build, postbuild assets
dsl_core.IO: input/output specification: user input validation, function signatures, variable types, structured output, download handlers

io_specification.__docs__: ورودی/خروجی کامل + validation + parallel sandbox + download capability + user input legal bounds
